item.title: John Wick
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: After the sudden death of his beloved wife, John Wick receives one last gift from her, a beagle puppy named […]
item.content:encoded: After the sudden death of his beloved wife, John Wick receives one last gift from her, a beagle puppy named Daisy, and a note imploring him not to forget how to love. But John’s mourning is interrupted when his 1969 Boss Mustang catches the eye of sadistic thug Iosef Tarasov who breaks into his house and steals it, beating John unconscious in the process. Unwittingly, he has just reawakened one of the most brutal assassins the underworld has ever known.

item.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: In 1926, Newt Scamander arrives at the Magical Congress of the United States of America with a magically expanded briefcase, […]
item.content:encoded: In 1926, Newt Scamander arrives at the Magical Congress of the United States of America with a magically expanded briefcase, which houses a number of dangerous creatures and their habitats. When the creatures escape from the briefcase, it sends the American wizarding authorities after Newt, and threatens to strain even further the state of magical and non-magical relations.

item.title: Jurassic World
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, […]
item.content:encoded: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, as originally envisioned by John Hammond.

item.title: Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: A teenager finds himself transported to an island where he must help protect a group of orphans with special powers […]
item.content:encoded: A teenager finds himself transported to an island where he must help protect a group of orphans with special powers from creatures intent on destroying them.

item.title: Captain America: Civil War
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Following the events of Age of Ultron, the collective governments of the world pass an act designed to regulate all […]
item.content:encoded: Following the events of Age of Ultron, the collective governments of the world pass an act designed to regulate all superhuman activity. This polarizes opinion amongst the Avengers, causing two factions to side with Iron Man or Captain America, which causes an epic battle between former allies.

item.title: Boys Over Flowers Session 1 Episode 2
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Jandi gets Jihoo’s help when students attack her at the locker room. Jandi, cannot stand Junpyo’s smugness, goes to see […]
item.content:encoded: Jandi gets Jihoo’s help when students attack her at the locker room. Jandi, cannot stand Junpyo’s smugness, goes to see Junpyo and kicks him right in the face. Rather than paying her back, Junpyo finds his curiosity from this girl who reminds him of his older sister, Junhee. After school finishes, unknown guards kidnap Jandi. She wakes up and notices the unbelievable things that are happening right in front of her eyes…

item.title: Boys Over Flowers Session 1 Episode 1
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Jan-di is an average high school girl whose parents operate a Laundromat. One day she delivers laundry to Shin-hwa high […]
item.content:encoded: Jan-di is an average high school girl whose parents operate a Laundromat. One day she delivers laundry to Shin-hwa high school, where the top 1% of the wealthy children gets to go, and accidentally saves a student from a suicidal attempt. After this incident, she is scouted to this prestigious school as a swimming athlete.

item.title: The Shawshank Redemption
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a […]
item.content:encoded: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates — including an older prisoner named Red — for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.

item.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Immediately after the events of The Desolation of Smaug, Bilbo and the dwarves try to defend Erebor’s mountain of treasure […]
item.content:encoded: Immediately after the events of The Desolation of Smaug, Bilbo and the dwarves try to defend Erebor’s mountain of treasure from others who claim it: the men of the ruined Laketown and the elves of Mirkwood. Meanwhile an army of Orcs led by Azog the Defiler is marching on Erebor, fueled by the rise of the dark lord Sauron. Dwarves, elves and men must unite, and the hope for Middle-Earth falls into Bilbo’s hands.

item.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
item.dc:creator: kenneth
item.description: Thirty years after defeating the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and his allies face a new threat from the evil Kylo […]
item.content:encoded: Thirty years after defeating the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and his allies face a new threat from the evil Kylo Ren and his army of Stormtroopers.
